title: The MHR Manufactured Home Registration Schema

mhrNumber.description: Unique manufactured home registration number assigned by the Manufactured Home Registry when a registration is created.

draftNumber.description: The identifier of the draft document if the registration is created from a draft. Include to mark the draft as used so it will be excluded from the account list.

documentId.description: Unique registration document ID/number required for new registrations as a reference to the decal; assigned by the Manufactured Home Registry.

documentRegistrationNumber.description: The document registration number that uniquely identifies a registration.

documentDescription.description: Included in a response as a description of the registration report document.

status.description: The status of the registration. ACTIVE - registered; DRAFT; EXEMPT; HISTORICAL - cancelled.

clientReferenceId.description: An optional client reference identifier associated with a change. Provided to facilitate client tracking of MHR activity.

attentionReference.description: The registration document attention or reference information.

declaredValue.description: The declared value of the manufactured home.

createDateTime.description: Generated by the MHR system and included in a response, the date and time a record is created in the system in the ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD.
